com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLShadersType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCGLShaderUniformsType

    public interface JCGLShadersType
extends JCGLShaderUniformsType
    The interface to shader compilation and use.

    • Method Summary

        void shaderDeleteProgram(JCGLProgramShaderType p)
                  throws JCGLException,
                         JCGLExceptionDeleted
        Delete the given shader.
        Parameters:
        p - The shader
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionDeleted - Iff the shader is already deleted

      • shaderCompileVertex

        JCGLVertexShaderType shaderCompileVertex(String name,
                                         List<String> lines)
                                  throws JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError,
                                         JCGLException
        Read a GLSL vertex shader from the lines of GLSL source code given in lines. Each line must be terminated with an end-of-line terminator (GLSL accepts both LF and CRLF as EOL tokens). The program will be named name in any error messages.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the program
        lines - A list of lines of GLSL source code
        Returns:
        A reference to the compiled vertex shader
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError - Iff a compilation error occurs
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • shaderCompileFragment

        JCGLFragmentShaderType shaderCompileFragment(String name,
                                             List<String> lines)
                                      throws JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError,
                                             JCGLException
        Read a GLSL fragment shader from the lines of GLSL source code given in lines. Each line must be terminated with an end-of-line terminator (GLSL accepts both LF and CRLF as EOL tokens). The program will be named name in any error messages.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the program
        lines - A list of lines of GLSL source code
        Returns:
        A reference to the compiled fragment shader
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError - Iff a compilation error occurs
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • shaderCompileGeometry

        JCGLGeometryShaderType shaderCompileGeometry(String name,
                                             List<String> lines)
                                      throws JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError,
                                             JCGLException
        Read a GLSL geometry shader from the lines of GLSL source code given in lines. Each line must be terminated with an end-of-line terminator (GLSL accepts both LF and CRLF as EOL tokens). The program will be named name in any error messages.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the program
        lines - A list of lines of GLSL source code
        Returns:
        A reference to the compiled geometry shader
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError - Iff a compilation error occurs
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • shaderLinkProgram

        JCGLProgramShaderType shaderLinkProgram(String name,
                                        JCGLVertexShaderUsableType v,
                                        Optional<JCGLGeometryShaderUsableType> g,
                                        JCGLFragmentShaderUsableType f)
                                 throws JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError,
                                        JCGLException,
                                        JCGLExceptionDeleted
        Link a program consisting of the vertex shader v, the optional geometry shader g, and the fragment shader f.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the program
        v - A vertex shader
        g - A geometry shader, if required
        f - A fragment shader
        Returns:
        A linked program
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionProgramCompileError - Iff the program cannot be linked
        JCGLExceptionDeleted - Iff any of the shaders have been deleted
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • shaderActivateProgram

        void shaderActivateProgram(JCGLProgramShaderUsableType p)
                    throws JCGLException,
                           JCGLExceptionDeleted
        Activate the given program for use in rendering.
        Parameters:
        p - The program
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionDeleted - Iff the shader has been deleted

      • shaderDeactivateProgram

        void shaderDeactivateProgram()
                      throws JCGLException
        Deactivate any active program. If no program is active, the call has no effect.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • shaderActivatedProgram

        Optional<JCGLProgramShaderUsableType> shaderActivatedProgram()
                                                      throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        The currently activated program, if any
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
